plot: During a roadtrip, four friends discover that the earth has been taken over by a supernatural evil. With death all around them, they discover that dying is only the beginning.
title: The Beginning
plot_es: During a roadtrip, four friends discover that the earth has been taken over by a supernatural evil. With death all around them, they discover that dying is only the beginning.
plot_en: During a roadtrip, four friends discover that the earth has been taken over by a supernatural evil. With death all around them, they discover that dying is only the beginning.
